name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full Page Screen Capture & Visual Feedback

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot of a full page of the browser screen and add new comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture full page screenshots super easily with our Full Page Screen Capture extension! This tool lets you grab a full snapshot of any site – every visible bit – so you can show all the details for feedback or bug reports. If your team’s working on prototypes, testing, or reviewing site functionality, this extension helps you share info and keep things organized.

With Full Page Screen Capture, each webpage you capture is saved with its URL, so you can upload, tag team members, share links, and leave comments. It’s perfect for making sure everyone stays in sync on design and development updates.

Our Plerdy UX checker (https://ux.plerdy.com/) has extra tools for team feedback on design and development. Need to report a bug? Add notes to a prototype? Analyze a webpage? This tool’s made to keep things smooth and fast.

Best Features of Full Page Screen Capture: 
💬 Team Communication – No more endless emails. Just share feedback and notes right in your team using the full-page screenshots. 
👌 Code-Free Setup – No coding skills needed. Install the extension, and you’re ready to start capturing full pages. 
🤓 Page Analysis – Great for heuristic analysis, UX audits, and remote user testing. Easy site evaluations for everyone. 
👨‍💼 Team Management – Use the sidebar to organize team feedback, manage tasks, and quickly share direct links with full-page captures. 
😃 Easy to Use – Simple for all users, even non-techy ones! Full Page Screen Capture is both easy and powerful.

Join thousands of teams around the world who rely on Full Page Screen Capture to manage projects, share insights, and keep everyone on the same page!
